root.name: The Path
root.description: OverviewThe Six SistersThe Path is a relatively short horror-adventure game with intentional slow pacing. Gameplay stresses exploration, discovery, narrative, and even introspection by the player and the player's character.The story of the game draws heavilly on the classic fairy tale, Little Red Riding Hood. The player begins by choosing from six playable sisters, each in very different stages of life: Robin, Rose, Ginger, Ruby, Carmen, and Scarlet. The player must then make their way to Grandmother's house, guided by a forest path. Following the path results in an uneventful "good ending", and a quick close to the game, but deviating from the path and exploring the dark forest reveals many secrets.AwardsAt the 2008 Independent Games Festival The Path was nominated for the Excellence in Visuals Arts award. The Path won two awards at the Spanish hóPLAY International Video Game Festival, for Best Sound and Best DesignSystem RequirementsWindows XP or Vista2 Ghz CPU1 GB RAM256 MB VRAMRecent Radeon or Geforce videocard of x6xx type (no integrated graphics)
